Articles.Content: Rule 54: Planes can land with horizontal speeds, rockets usually not.
Rule 55, inscribed on the engine\'s nozzle: *This side down.*
Rule 56: The capsule should go on the foremost part of the ship, unless it\'s a plane, in which case put it wherever the heck you want.
Rule 57: Make sure to avoid trying to use parachutes on the Mun.

Rule 58: Deploying a parachute in the atmosphere and dragging it to space is cool.

Rule 58B: Rockets are cool.
Rule 59: Overheating is NOT cool.
Rule 60: If you don\'t want to die, end the flight.
Rule 61: A true Kerbal stays with his pilots to the end, and completely ignores rule 60.
Rule 62: If a space station is too heavy to orbit, you have 15 minutes to do the experiments, then GET THE HELL OUT OF THERE!

Rule 63: A failed launch can be a good firework... 

Rule 64: ... or a carpet bombing

> 
> Rule 63: A failed launch can be a good firework... 
> 
> Rule 64: ... or a carpet bombing

Rule 65. ...and thus is to be considered as \'successful\' one.
Rule 66 (corollary). At Kerbin, *all* launches succeed.

Rule 67: A rocket on the launchpad can still have an apoapsis.

Rule 68: Metal cans can explode.

Rule 69: There are no female kerbonauts. EVER.

Rule 70: Rule 69 may invalidated in the future.

Rule 71: Do not put it beyond kerbals to use explosives to raise/lower their landing legs.

Rule 72: What goes up does not necessarily need to come down.

Rule 73: Rocket science isn\'t only for rocket scientists.
Rule 74: Just becuse it worked once, dosent mean it will work again.
Rule 75: Having enough fuel to get back to Kerbin does not necessarily mean you will make it back to Kerbin

Rule 76: Lithobraking is best braking

Rule 77: RCS IS KREDIT TO TEAM.
Rule 78: Don\'t use boosters on the Minmus, no matter how much Jeb wants to.
Rule 79: Rick Rolling people is only for annoying people to death, science and should always, never be attempted with, without bananas, permission.

80: Don\'t decompile the game

81: Don\'t pirate the game

82: Pay double the price when you like it

83: Don\'t ask for release date of release

84: Have fun

85: Follow all the current and all the future rules
86.) Hail Probe :hailprobe:
87.) Never confuse stock users with purists.
[88]: KSP always takes priority over school and work ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
89) All flights of Kerbal Airlines are always bound to hell. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
90: Don\'t mourn over RP. Nova will kill you if you do.
